comments.creator: debloper@gmail.com
comments.author: debloper@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Take these for example:
> http://hg.mozilla.org/webtools/mcs/file/cd8a2263bf4a/others/slides/MCS%20keynote.zip
> http://hg.mozilla.org/webtools/mcs/file/cd8a2263bf4a/theme/style%20guide/MOZ_communitiesStyleGuide_022709.indd.bz2

KTH, INDD etc are highly platform/application specific filetypes. Most of the users wouldn't have Mac/Adobe Creative Suite at their disposal. But if those files are there to make a point, it's better to have a PNG/JPG alternative that can be accessible by everyone.
